title: Cognitive Development Process Through Studio-Based Engineering Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Engineering Design Concepts and Language Communication Skills
context.additional_context: Implementing a collaborative learning environment using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Learners enhance creative problem-solving skills through team-based design projects in a VR-based studio environment
Learners construct an epistemic frame through peer feedback and iterative practice processes
Learners strengthen communication and documentation skills in the design process using digital collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
